meanings.definition: A unit of measurement equal to one thousand bases in a nucleic acid molecule.
meanings.sent1: Scientists use kilobases to measure the length of DNA strands.
meanings.sent2: The lab report mentioned that the DNA sequence was over two kilobases long.
meanings.sent3: Why did the DNA molecule go to school? To learn about kilobases!
meanings.sent4: The DNA strand stretched out like a kilobases ruler, revealing its true length.
meanings.sent5: In the world of genetics, understanding kilobases is crucial for research.
